医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
隆德大学的路易斯·奥利维拉 (Luís Oliveira) 在研究员大奖赛上获得最高荣誉​今年的研究员大奖赛由隆德大学的 Luís Oliveira 获胜。在瑞典最大的研究人员科学传播竞赛中，决赛入围者将由观众和专家评审团根据其演讲的简单性、参与度和清晰度进行评判。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Lund-Universitys-Luis-Oliveira-takes-home-top-honor-at-Researchers-Grand-Prix.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Lund-Universitys-Luis-Oliveira-takes-home-top-honor-at-Researchers-Grand-Prix.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d86e43d2-5119-4d75-835d-08183d5d389b Thu, 28 Nov 2024 12:43:34 -0500 Lund University's Luís Oliveira takes home top honor at Researcher's Grand Prix
关于人类祖先双足运动如何以及何时进化的新见解人类谱系进化中最令人着迷的时期之一是能够两足行走的第一个祖先的出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/New-insights-into-how-and-when-bipedal-locomotion-evolved-in- human-ancestors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/New-insights-into-how-and-when-bipedal-locomotion-evolved-in- human-ancestors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=385a306a-2f7b-45e6-87a2-dba39cac683a Thu, 28 Nov 2024 12:38:00 -0500 New insights into how and when bipedal locomotion evolved in human ancestors
新模型可以解释自闭症谱系障碍的神经和行为差异耶路撒冷希伯来大学心理学系以及埃德蒙和莉莉·萨夫拉脑科学中心 (ELSC) 的研究人员 Yuval Hart 博士和 Oded Wertheimer 开发了一种新的计算模型来解释自闭症谱系障碍的神经和行为差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/New-model-can-explain-neural-and-behavioral-differences-in-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/New-model-can-explain-neural-and-behavioral-differences-in-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ee181ac-dea7-416a-a153-dd088487449f Thu, 28 Nov 2024 12:31:49 -0500 New model can explain neural and behavioral differences in autism spectrum disorder
人口和社会经济因素影响爱尔兰前列腺癌的检测爱尔兰前列腺癌的最新研究结果揭示了诊断差异，特别是在城市地区和中等社会经济群体中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Demographic-and-socioeconomic-factors-impact-prostate-cancer-detection-in-Ireland.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Demographic-and-socioeconomic-factors-impact-prostate-cancer-detection-in-Ireland.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d632b7b3-ae09-4b4a-bfcb-7a5825a44921 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 12:25:00 -0500 Demographic and socioeconomic factors impact prostate cancer detection in Ireland
研究强调激素治疗对跨性别者的长期健康影响卡罗林斯卡学院的新研究表明，跨性别者的长期性激素治疗可能会导致身体成分和心血管疾病危险因素的显着变化，尤其是跨性别男性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Research-highlights-long-term-health-effects-of-hormone-therapy-in-transgender-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Research-highlights-long-term-health-effects-of-hormone-therapy-in-transgender-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70ab9fc9-006a-41d8-90ad-a43bc0ed5a90 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 12:02:00 -0500 Research highlights long-term health effects of hormone therapy in transgender individuals
长期新冠疫情导致更高的医疗保健需求和更高的成本患有长期新冠肺炎的人使用医疗服务的次数明显多于诊断前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Long-COVID-leads-to-higher-healthcare-demands-and-increased-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Long-COVID-leads-to-higher-healthcare-demands-and-increased-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d73dbd3-a3dd-4282-8ec7-20a91eb3c7a1 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 11:44:37 -0500 Long COVID leads to higher healthcare demands and increased costs
研究揭示脂肪细胞如何安全地增大以储存能量国家心血管研究中心 (CNIC) 的一个研究小组，由 Miguel Ángel del Pozo Barriuso 教授领导，他是 CNIC 机械适应和小窝生物学小组的负责人，他们发现了脂肪细胞中一种使脂肪细胞能够增大的基本机制。安全地储存能量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Research-sheds-light-on-how-fat-cells-safely-enlarge-to-store-energy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Research-sheds-light-on-how-fat-cells-safely-enlarge-to-store-energy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fdbd98b-600d-4f5c-a582-a7c86a1a902e Thu, 28 Nov 2024 11:30:39 -0500 Research sheds light on how fat cells safely enlarge to store energy
遗传特征如何导致南亚人早期糖尿病发病和代谢挑战该研究揭示了导致南亚人早期 2 型糖尿病的遗传因素，强调了胰岛素依赖和药物反应挑战的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/How-genic-traits-contribute-to-earlier-diabetes-onset-and-metabolic-challenges-in-South-Asians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/How-genic-traits-contribute-to-earlier-diabetes-onset-and-metabolic-challenges-in-South-Asians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdb24297-1fba-4181-ba13-d4284cc6879c Thu, 28 Nov 2024 11:06:00 -0500 How genetic traits contribute to earlier diabetes onset and metabolic challenges in South Asians
研究揭示激素治疗更年期症状的不同风险乌普萨拉大学的研究人员分析了七种不同激素治疗更年期症状对血栓、中风和心脏病风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-varied-risks-of-hormone-treatments-for-menopausal-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-varied-risks-of-hormone-treatments-for-menopausal-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8683c63-4392-4af6-aec8-b79b60a27c36 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 11:02:11 -0500 Study reveals varied risks of hormone treatments for menopausal symptoms
研究揭示暂时性血流减少对高血压大鼠血管的影响阿拉巴马大学神经科学研究所 (INc-UAB) 和 CIBERCV 研究员 Francesc Jiménez-Altayó 博士协调进行的一项研究表明，大脑暂时缺乏血流可能会导致腹部小动脉发生持久变化在患有高血压的老鼠中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-effects-of-temporary-blood-flow-loss-on-blood-vessels-in-hypertential-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-effects-of-temporary-blood-flow-loss-on-blood-vessels-in-hypertential-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ecb3432-290b-466e-a8d2-77df81301498 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 10:08:00 -0500 Study reveals effects of temporary blood flow loss on blood vessels in hypertensive rats
